items.text: eases this length delivery carefully towards point.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: slides across the shortish delivery, eased to sweeper cover.

items.text: tucked to short fine, Imrul refuses the single.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: chipped, but just short of the man coming in from cover. Good bowling, got this to dip on Mithun.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: bounce from outside off, he shapes to cut but gets a thick edge over the slip fielder. Lucky boundary
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: skids one in to cramp Mithun for room as he attempts to pull, gets a thick inside edge onto the pad.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: gets to the pitch and eases this with the spin to long-off.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: Sikandar Raza brought in for his quick offspin
items.text: works this to square leg for an easy single
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: drops short, he makes room and cracks this to deep point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: quicker one on middle and leg, turns this to the leg side, short fine come swooping in.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: drilled down to long-on for an easy single
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: slides one back in from round the stumps, gets a thick inside edge towards mid-on
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: lunges forward and smothers this delivery quite nicely.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: crashed off the backfoot to deep cover.

items.text: works this with the spin to midwicket

items.text: googly that he reads off the pitch, bunted into the off side for a quick single
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: breaks away from length outside off, draws him forward. Defended with soft hands.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: pulled away into the gap. There was deep square, deep midwicket and he bisected the gap to perfection.
items.postText: Dipu: "Hi kishore...You should publish something " -- When there's something that makes sense.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: turns this into the gap at square leg.

items.preText: Zmn: "All quiet in the western front. Commentators are in hibernation. They forgot to post any comment." -- Give me a compelling insight
items.text: tossed up outside off, pushed back to the bowler.

items.text: fired in quickly on a length, defended to short cover.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: right to the pitch of the ball as he eases to long-off and brings up his half-century
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Imrul was brought into the Asia Cup squad midway, impressed there and continues his good run
items.text: punches straight to cover

items.text: gets to the pitch of the ball and drives down to long-off.

items.text: on the shorter side, he whips this down to deep midwicket
items.postText: Time for change of controls in commentary. Hemant is back for a new stint
